solution_line_template: The younger son received three times as many toys as the elder son, which is {multiplier}*{elder_son_toys} = <<{multiplier}*{elder_son_toys}={younger_son_toys}>>{younger_son_toys} toys
Since he bought the toys together, he purchased {younger_son_toys}+{elder_son_toys} = <<{younger_son_toys}+{elder_son_toys}={total_toys}>>{total_toys} toys.
